name: Yo Dawg, I Heard You Like Cars
name_original: Yo Dawg, I Heard You Like Cars
description:
Have you ever wanted to put a car in a car, so you can drive while you drive? Yo Dawg, I Heard You Like Cars is a fun racing game where you get to drive around a track on the inside of a moving car!

This game was made during a 10-day meme-themed game jam for ASU's Game 2 class in collaboration with Aidan Fyfe, Avery Devlin, Faith Popov, Joseph Fabian, and Summer Gautier.
